params._rareAmountIn: uint128 amount of RARE to trade for the _tokenOut.
params._tokenOut: Address of the ERC20 token to be swapped for.

params._minAmountOut: Min amount one is willing to receive for the _rareIn.
params._rareIn: The amount of RARE one is looking to trade.
params._tokenOut: Address of the ERC20 to pay out with. If null address, then uses ETH.

estimateRarePrice(address,uint128).notice: Estimate the discounted $RARE price for a given token.

rewardSwap(address,uint256,uint128).notice: Swap RARE for a discounted price on tokens stored

documentation.text: @notice Error emitted when a parameter is too low.
@notice Error emitted when user doesnt meet the criteria for call.
@notice Error emitted via {rewardSwap} if reward swap doesn't have enough funds to perform the swap.
@notice Error emitted via {rewardSwap} if the rare price is too low to handle the _minAmountOut requirement.
@notice Error emitted via {rewardSwap} if _tokenOut is the $RARE address.
@notice Emitted when an unsupported ERC20 token for reward swapping.
